subject: Cricket (Game)
lead_paragraph: Chennai became the first team to retain the I.P.L. championship Saturday when it defeated the Royal Challengers Bangalore by 58 runs, continuing its dominance in the Twenty20 format.
snippet: Chennai became the first team to retain the I.P.L. championship Saturday when it defeated the Royal Challengers Bangalore by 58 runs, continuing its dominance in the Twenty20 format.
